name: That’s What It’s All About
content: I know it's all about you
Maybe i was wrong about it
噢，或许我之前犯过一些错
But this time i'll get it right
但这一次，我不会再错了
I know it's all about you
我知道你心存疑虑，是的
是的，真正的问题就出在这儿
People said i could live without you
如果我说，没有你我照样可以活下去
That would be a lie that would be a lie
I was surely down without you
没有你，我一定活不下去
Ooh lesson learned blame it all on me
听着，学会把所有问题归咎于我
I know it's all about you
我知道你心存疑虑，是的
Love you got to have some patience
恋爱中的你，需要一点耐心
When you know whats on your mind
当你清楚心中的想法时
我知道你心存疑虑，是的
All about you all about me
一切只关乎你，一切只关乎我
All about love all about trust
一切只关乎爱，关乎信任
All about you all about me
我知道你心存疑虑，是的
